long_description: Built for paddling in chilly waters, the men's O'Neill Epic II 3/2mm full wetsuit provides the warmth needed to charge into your element, sync up with the waves and forget about everything else. O'Neill recommends the Epic II 3/2 Full men's wetsuit for water temperatures ranging from 50degF to 68degF. Stretchy 3/2mm neoprene (3mm in body, 2mm in arms and legs) conforms to your body for a flexible, comfortable fit; flatseam construction prevents chafing. Rear zipper secures fit, and protective internal flap shields your skin from abrasion; offset zipper teeth slow down water entry into the back of the suit to enhance warmth. Rip-and-stick neck tab and long zipper pull in back ease dressing. Very comfortable double-seal neck closure offers snug comfort without being restrictive. Front and rear Fluidflex(TM) Firewall neoprene panels protect core and promote unencumbered motion. Internal chest panel enhances warmth with a soft, moisture-wicking lining. Glued and blindstitched construction blocks out water entry into suit to keep you warmer in the water. Tough fabric over knees increases durability. External key pocket. Hand wash the men's O'Neill Epic II 3/2mm full wetsuit in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: Built for paddling in chilly waters, the men's O'Neill Epic II 3/2mm full wetsuit provides the warmth needed to charge into your element, sync up with the waves and forget about everything else.
